Combat
Hit Points: 70 Initiative: 3 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Firearms; Martial
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (+9 1+3 R25/100); Greatclub (+8 1d8+4); Mace (+8 1d6+4); Unarmed (+8 1+4)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +30
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +3
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Damage Adjustment: +4
Crusher: Bludgeoning hit moves foe 5'; critical hit gives allies Adv on attacks for 1 rd
Favored Foe: Hit on marked foe inflicts +1d6 HP weapon damage for conc or 1 min 4/long rest
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed weapon
Gunner: Attacks not slowed by loading, no Disadv on ranged attacks w/in 5' of foe
Piercer: Additional piercing critical hit die, reroll 1 piercing damage die 1/rd
Poisoner: Ignore poison resistance, coat weapon w/poison for 1 min (inflicts +2d8 HP poison and poisoned condition (DC 14 Constitution neg) for 1 rd)
Slasher: Slashing damage inflicts -10 Speed for 1 rd; critical hit inflicts Disadv on attacks for 1 rd
Telekinetic (Charisma): R30' Telepathic shove moves target 5' (DC 15 Strength neg)
Telekinetic (Intelligence): R30' Telepathic shove moves target 5' (DC 13 Strength neg)
Telekinetic (Wisdom): R30' Telepathic shove moves target 5' (DC 16 Strength neg)
Tireless: Self gains 1d8+4 temporary HP 4/long rest, short rest reduces exhaustion by 1
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Strength
Save: Charisma: 3; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 1; Strength: 8; Wisdom: 4
Save Notes:
Fey Ancestry: Adv on saves vs. charm/Immune to magical sleep
Land's Stride: Adv on saves vs. impeding plants
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 2; A1: 1; R1: 4; R2: 3; R3: 2 Attack: A: 5; C: 8; D: 8; R: 8; S: 7; W: 5 Spell DC: A: 13; C: 16; D: 16; R: 16; S: 15; W: 13
Spells:
Beast Sense (R2 Divi): Self may perceive through touched willing beast's senses for conc up to 1 hr [R]
Beast Sense (R2 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self may perceive through touched willing beast's senses for conc up to 1 hr [R]
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four pieces of ammo attack non-designated creatures w/in 30', inflicting 1d6 HP piercing each (Dexterity neg), for 8 hr [+Level affects +2 pieces]
Cure Wounds (R1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+4 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Detect Thoughts (C2 [Telepathic (Wisdom)] Divi): R30' Self senses target surface thoughts and may probe deeper (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min
Detect Thoughts (S2 [Telepathic (Charisma)] Divi): R30' Self senses target surface thoughts and may probe deeper (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min
Detect Thoughts (W2 [Telepathic (Intelligence)] Divi): R30' Self senses target surface thoughts and may probe deeper (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min
Disguise Self (A1 Illu): Self body and clothing appear different (Investigation detects) for 1 hr
Elemental Weapon (R3 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and +1d4 HP choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder for conc up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2/+3 attack and +2d4/+3d4 damage at level 5/7]
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Self next successful attack restrains foe and inflicts 1d6 HP/rd piercing (Strength ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Find Traps (R2 Divi): R120' Self senses the presence of traps
Fog Cloud (R1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc up to 1 hr [+Level increases radius by 20']
Invisibility (C2 [Shadow Touched (Wisdom)] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Invisibility (S2 [Shadow Touched (Charisma)] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Invisibility (W2 [Shadow Touched (Intelligence)] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Hand (D0 [Telekinetic (Wisdom)] Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Mage Hand (S0 [Telekinetic (Charisma)] Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Mage Hand (W0 [Telekinetic (Intelligence)] Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Misty Step (D2 [Fey Touched (Wisdom)] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Misty Step (S2 [Fey Touched (Charisma)] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Misty Step (W2 [Fey Touched (Intelligence)] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Causes plants to overgrow in a 100' radius or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 yr
Ray Of Frost (A0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Searing Smite (R1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +1d6 HP fire, plus 1d6 HP fire/rd (Constitution ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP initial]
Speak With Animals (R1 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self may talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Speak With Plants (R3 [Primal Awareness] Tran): Self may talk with and command plants for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Artificer Initiate: Know 1 A0 spell, cast 1 A1 spell 1/long rest
Chef: Food prepared during short rest heals 1d8 HP for 8 targets; treats prepared during long rest give 4 temporary HP to 4 targets
Distant Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to dbl spell range or to touch at 30'
Eldritch Spear: Increases Eldritch Blast range to 300'
Fey Touched (Charisma): Cast Misty Step and 1 level 1 divination or enchantment spell 1/long rest
Fey Touched (Intelligence): Cast Misty Step and 1 level 1 divination or enchantment spell 1/long rest
Fey Touched (Wisdom): Cast Misty Step and 1 level 1 divination or enchantment spell 1/long rest
Nature's Veil: Self becomes invisible for 1 rd 4/long rest
Primal Awareness: Cast Speak With Animals, Beast Sense, Speak With Plants 1/long rest
Shadow Touched (Charisma): Cast Invisibility and 1 level 1 illusion or necromancy spell 1/long rest
Shadow Touched (Intelligence): Cast Invisibility and 1 level 1 illusion or necromancy spell 1/long rest
Shadow Touched (Wisdom): Cast Invisibility and 1 level 1 illusion or necromancy spell 1/long rest
Spellcasting Focus: Use druidic focus for ranger spells
Subtle Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast a spell w/out somatic or verbal components
Telekinetic (Charisma): Cast Mage Hand
Telekinetic (Intelligence): Cast Mage Hand
Telekinetic (Wisdom): Cast Mage Hand
Telepathic (Charisma): Cast Detect Thoughts 1/long rest
Telepathic (Intelligence): Cast Detect Thoughts 1/long rest
Telepathic (Wisdom): Cast Detect Thoughts 1/long rest
